entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 p.m. MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 25.9Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Smoke. Low 11.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Smoke. High 22.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Smoke. Low 9.
